Class CertificateDeposit

java.lang.Object
com.example.project3.banking.Account
com.example.project3.banking.Savings
com.example.project3.banking.CertificateDeposit
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Account>
public class CertificateDeposit extends Savings
Represents a Certificate Deposit account, which is a time-bound savings account with fixed term durations and varying interest rates based on the term selected. Extends the functionality of the `Savings` class, providing additional attributes and behaviors for managing Certificate Deposit-specific terms and rates.

  • Constructor Details

    • CertificateDeposit

      public CertificateDeposit(Branch branch, AccountType type, Profile holder, int term, Date open, double balance)
      Constructs a CertificateDeposit object, which represents a time-bound deposit account with a specified term, opening date, and initial balance.
      Parameters:
      branch - the branch where the certificate deposit is opened
      type - the type of account, typically Certificate Deposit
      holder - the profile of the account holder
      term - the term duration of the certificate deposit in months
      open - the date when the certificate deposit account is opened
      balance - the initial balance of the certificate deposit

  • Method Details

    • getOpen

      public Date getOpen()
      Retrieves the opening date of the certificate deposit account.
      Returns:
      the opening date of the certificate deposit as a Date object

    • getTerm

      public int getTerm()
      Retrieves the term duration of the certificate deposit.
      Returns:
      the term duration of the certificate deposit in months

    • interestRate

      public double interestRate(Date closeDate)
      Calculates the interest rate applicable for a Certificate Deposit based on the duration in months between the opening date and the provided closing date.
      Parameters:
      closeDate - the date when the certificate deposit is closed
      Returns:
      the applicable interest rate as a double value

    • interestRate

      public double interestRate()
      Determines the interest rate applicable for the certificate deposit based on the term duration.
      Overrides:

      Returns:
      the applicable interest rate as a double

      public String toString()

      Overrides:
      toString in class Savings
